Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.salesOverTimeDescription: Total sales over the last 30 days.
Dashboard.recentSalesDescription: A quick look at your latest transactions.
Dashboard.lowStockDescription: These products are at or below their reorder point.
Dashboard.noLowStock: All products are above their reorder points. Great job!

ReportsPage.title: Reports
ReportsPage.pageDescription: Generate new reports using natural language with our AI assistant, or view, manage, and delete your previously saved reports below.
ReportsPage.queryDescription: Describe the report you want to generate in natural language. The AI will interpret your request, fetch the data, and build the report for you.
ReportsPage.queryPlaceholder: e.g., 'Show me total sales per category for last month', or 'List all products with less than 20 items in stock, ordered by quantity.'
ReportsPage.errorQueryEmpty: Please enter a description of the report you want to generate.
ReportsPage.errorGeneratingReport: An error occurred while generating the report: {error}
ReportsPage.loadingDescription: The AI is analyzing your request and fetching data. This may take a moment.
ReportsPage.querySales: Generate a sales report for the current month, grouped by day.
ReportsPage.queryBestSellers: List the top 10 best-selling products by quantity sold all time.
ReportsPage.queryStock: List all products with a stock quantity of less than 20 units, ordered by quantity ascending.
ReportsPage.queryFrequentClients: List the top 10 most frequent clients by number of transactions.
ReportsPage.queryPendingDispatches: Generate a report of all sales with a 'Pending' dispatch status.
ReportsPage.listDescription: View and manage your previously saved reports.
ReportsPage.noReportsFound: No reports have been saved yet.
ReportsPage.noReportsHint: You can generate and save new reports from the AI Reports page.
ReportsPage.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the report "{reportName}"? This action cannot be undone.
ReportsPage.reportDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief summary of what this report contains
ReportsPage.saveReportDialogDescription: Save the generated report for future access.
ReportsPage.aiNotConfigured: The AI reporting feature is disabled. Please set your Gemini API Key in the settings to enable it.

MultiLanguageInput.dialogDescription: Enter the values for each available language.

POSPage.scanBarPlaceholder: Scan barcode or type product name...
POSPage.cartEmpty: Your cart is empty. Add products to get started.
POSPage.errorFetchingInitialData: Could not load initial client, tax, promotion, or payment method data.
POSPage.invalidPaymentAmount: Please enter a valid payment amount.
POSPage.paymentExceedsTotal: Payment amount cannot exceed remaining total of {amount}.
POSPage.noPaymentMethodsAppliedError: No payment methods have been applied to this transaction.
POSPage.errorProcessingPayment: Failed to process payment for the transaction.
POSPage.errorProcessingPaymentAPI: Failed to process payment via API.
POSPage.taxAlreadyAppliedError: This tax has already been applied.
POSPage.noTaxSelectedError: Please select a tax to add.
POSPage.selectCartToCheckout: Select a cart to begin checkout.
POSPage.noPendingCarts: No carts are pending for checkout.
POSPage.dispatchNowTooltip: If enabled, this will affect stock by decrementing the quantities sold.

DispatchManager.title: Dispatch Manager
DispatchManager.listDescription: Review and process inventory dispatches for completed sales.
DispatchManager.searchPlaceholder: Search by sale ID or client name...
DispatchManager.dispatchFailedNoItems: No items selected for dispatch. Please enter a quantity greater than zero for at least one item.
DispatchManager.dispatchFailedError: An error occurred while dispatching items.
DispatchManager.dispatchSuccessPartial: Items for sale #{saleId} have been partially dispatched.
DispatchManager.dialogDescription: Review items and update stock levels. Dispatched quantities cannot be undone.
DispatchManager.alreadyDispatchedDescription: All items for this sale have already been dispatched from inventory.
DispatchManager.noItemsToDispatch: All items for this sale have been dispatched.
DispatchManager.noPendingDispatches: No dispatches found for the selected criteria.

ProductManagementPage.title: Product Management
ProductManagementPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the product "{productName}".
ProductManagementPage.errorFetchingProducts: Could not fetch products from the server.
ProductManagementPage.invalidFileTypeError: Invalid file type. Please select a JSON or CSV file.
ProductManagementPage.jsonParseErrorDescription: Could not parse the selected file. Please ensure it is valid.

AddProductDialog.dialogDescription: Fill in the details below to add a new product to your inventory.
AddProductDialog.positiveOrZeroError: Must be a positive number or zero.

EditProductDialog.dialogDescription: Update the details for "{productName}". Click save when you're done.

ProductListTable.noProductsMessage: No products found. Click "Add New Product" to get started.

GridSettingsDialog.title: Customize Grid View
GridSettingsDialog.description: Select columns to display, change their order, set grouping, and apply templates or saved configurations.
GridSettingsDialog.templatesDescription: Select a predefined template or one of your saved configurations to quickly apply settings.
GridSettingsDialog.saveCurrentConfigurationLabel: Save Current View as New Configuration
GridSettingsDialog.configSavedSuccessDescription: Configuration "{name}" saved successfully to your browser.
GridSettingsDialog.errorSavingConfig: Could not save configuration to local storage.
GridSettingsDialog.groupingSelectedLabel: {count, plural, one {# column} other {# columns}} grouped by
GridSettingsDialog.groupingDescription: Select columns to group by. Order of selection matters for hierarchy.

ImportProductsSettingsDialog.title: Import Settings
ImportProductsSettingsDialog.description: Importing {count} items from "{fileName}". Configure advanced settings below.

AdvancedImportDialog.uploadDescription: Upload a CSV or Excel file to import data into the system.
AdvancedImportDialog.dragDropPrompt: Drag & drop your file here, or
AdvancedImportDialog.errorNotEnoughRows: File must contain a header row and at least one data row.
AdvancedImportDialog.mappingDescription: Match the columns from your file to the corresponding fields in the {modelName} model.
AdvancedImportDialog.confirmDescription: Review the settings and a preview of your data before starting the import of {count} rows from {fileName}.

ClientManagementPage.title: Client Management
ClientManagementPage.errorFetchingClients: Could not fetch clients from the server.
ClientManagementPage.errorFailedToUpdateClientAPI: Failed to update client. Please try again.
ClientManagementPage.errorFailedToDeleteClientAPI: Failed to delete client. Please try again.
ClientManagementPage.deleteDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this client?
ClientManagementPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the client "{clientName}".

AddClientDialog.title: Add New Client
AddClientDialog.description: Fill in the details below to add a new client.

EditClientDialog.title: Edit Client
EditClientDialog.description: Update the details for "{clientName}". Click save when you're done.

ClientListTable.noClientsMessage: No clients found. Click "Add New Client" to get started.

SalesReportPage.title: Sales
SalesReportPage.reportBuilderDescription: Use the filters below to create custom sales reports. You can sort, group, and customize columns using the table controls.
SalesReportPage.errorFetchingSales: Could not fetch sales transactions from the server.
SalesReportPage.noDataToExportDescription: There are no transactions in the current view to export.

SalesTable.noTransactionsMessage: No sales transactions found for the selected period.

ReceiptView.notFoundMessage: The requested transaction could not be found.
ReceiptView.notFoundMessageApi: The requested transaction ID was not found in the database.
ReceiptView.errorFetchingTransaction: An error occurred while trying to fetch the transaction details.
ReceiptView.errorFetchingTransactionOrSettings: An error occurred while trying to fetch transaction or receipt settings.
ReceiptView.shareNotSupportedAlert: Sharing is not supported on this browser, or no transaction data available.
ReceiptView.sharePermissionDenied: Could not share receipt. Permission was denied by your browser or system.
ReceiptView.shareFailedError: Failed to share receipt. Please try again.
ReceiptView.shareNotSupportedError: Sharing is not supported on this browser or no transaction data is available.

ThemeManagerPage.title: Theme Manager
ThemeManagerPage.addNewThemeDescription: Create a new visual theme with a unique name.
ThemeManagerPage.themeSetDefaultSuccessDescription: Theme "{themeName}" is now the default theme.

AddThemeDialog.title: Add New Theme
AddThemeDialog.description: Enter a name for your new theme. Colors and fonts will be generated randomly.

EditThemeDialog.title: Edit Theme: {themeName}
EditThemeDialog.description: Customize the fonts and HSL color values for this theme.

TranslationsManagerPage.title: Translations Manager
TranslationsManagerPage.listDescription: Modify the text for different languages used throughout the application. Changes are saved automatically per row.
TranslationsManagerPage.saveSuccessDescription: Translation for key '{key}' has been updated.
TranslationsManagerPage.autoTranslateDescription: Click the ‚ú® icon on a row to automatically translate the English text to all other active languages.
TranslationsManagerPage.errorNoSourceText: Cannot auto-translate. Please provide a value for the English (en) field first.
TranslationsManagerPage.infoNoLanguagesToTranslate: All active languages already have translations for this key.

LanguagesManagerPage.title: Languages Manager
LanguagesManagerPage.description: Add, remove, and configure the languages available in the application.
LanguagesManagerPage.applyAndRestartTooltip: Saves the current enabled/default language configuration to src/i18n-config.ts. A server restart is required for these changes to take full effect on routing and middleware.
LanguagesManagerPage.addNewLanguageTooltip: Define a new language for use in the app.
LanguagesManagerPage.warningDescription: After enabling/disabling languages or changing the default, you must click 'Apply & Update Config File' and then restart your application server for the changes to fully apply.
LanguagesManagerPage.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the language "{langName}"? This will also remove any associated translation data.

AppLanguageListTable.noLanguagesMessage: No languages configured. Click 'Add New Language' to begin.

Toasts.stockLimitReachedDescription: Cannot add more {productName}. Max stock is {maxStock}.
Toasts.multipleProductsFoundDescription: Select the desired product from the 'Quick Add Products' list below.
Toasts.productNotFoundDescription: No product matches this barcode or name.
Toasts.emptyCartDescription: Cannot process payment for an empty cart.
Toasts.paymentMethodSetDefault: Payment method "{methodName}" was set as default.
Toasts.paymentMethodDefaultSetDescription: "{methodName}" is now the default payment method.
Toasts.settingsSavedDescription: Your settings have been successfully updated.
Toasts.noProductsToExportDescription: There are no products to export.
Toasts.noProductsToImportError: There are no products selected or parsed for import.
Toasts.importFailedError: Product import failed. Please check the file and settings.
Toasts.configAppliedDescription: i18n-config.ts updated. Please restart your server.
Toasts.rolePermissionsUpdatedDescription: Permissions for role "{roleName}" have been successfully updated.
Toasts.rolePermissionsUpdateFailed: Failed to update permissions for role "{roleName}". Error: {error}
Toasts.supplierImportSummary: Supplier import finished: {created} created, {updated} updated, {skipped} skipped, {errors} errors.
Toasts.smtpSettingsUpdateFailed: Failed to update SMTP settings. Error: {error}
Toasts.userInviteResentDescription: A new setup invitation has been sent to {userEmail}.
Toasts.userInviteLoggedToConsole: Email service not configured. Invitation link for {userEmail} was logged to the server console.
Toasts.supplierCostsUpdated: Cost update for {supplierName} complete. {updated} products updated. {notFound} not found. {invalid} rows with invalid costs.
Toasts.supplierCostsUpdateFailed: Failed to update product costs. Error: {error}
Toasts.themeDefaultSetDescription: Theme "{themeName}" is now the default theme.

NotificationsManagerPage.title: Notification Manager
NotificationsManagerPage.description: View and manage all system notifications.
NotificationsManagerPage.errorFetchingNotificationsApi: API Error: Could not retrieve notifications.
NotificationsManagerPage.errorUpdatingStatusApi: API Error: Could not update notification status.
NotificationsManagerPage.errorDeletingNotificationApi: API Error: Could not delete notification.
NotificationsManagerPage.markAllReadComingSoon: Mark all as read will be available soon.
NotificationsManagerPage.deleteAllReadComingSoon: Delete all read notifications will be available soon.
NotificationsManagerPage.importNotSupported: Importing notifications is not a supported feature.

Common.loadingDescription: Please wait while content is loading.

formErrors.invalidDateRange: End date must be after start date.
formErrors.invalidCommaSeparatedList: Must be a comma-separated list or empty.

AccessDenied.title: Access Denied
AccessDenied.message: You do not have permission to view this page or perform this action. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.

RolesPermissionsPage.title: Roles & Permissions
RolesPermissionsPage.descriptionEdit: Select a role to view and edit its assigned permissions. Admin role permissions are not editable.
RolesPermissionsPage.descriptionViewOnly: This page displays the current roles and their associated permissions within the application. This is a view-only display.
RolesPermissionsPage.selectRoleLabel: Select a Role to Manage Permissions:
RolesPermissionsPage.saveSuccessDescription: Permissions for role '{roleName}' have been updated.
RolesPermissionsPage.errorNoRoleSelected: Please select a role before saving changes.
RolesPermissionsPage.adminPermissionsNote: Admin role permissions are fixed and include all system permissions.

CountryManagerPage.title: Country Manager
CountryManagerPage.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the country "{countryName}"? This action cannot be undone.

AddCountryDialog.title: Add New Country
AddCountryDialog.description: Define a new country for the application.
AddCountryDialog.codeAlpha2FormatError: Alpha-2 code must be 2 uppercase letters.
AddCountryDialog.codeAlpha3FormatError: Alpha-3 code must be 3 uppercase letters.
AddCountryDialog.currencyCodeFormatError: Currency code must be 3 uppercase letters.

CountryListTable.noCountriesMessage: No countries found. Click 'Add New Country' to get started.

CurrencyManager.title: Currency Manager
CurrencyManager.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the currency "{currencyName} ({currencyCode})"? This action cannot be undone.
CurrencyManager.noCurrenciesMessage: No currencies found. Click "Add New Currency" to get started.

AddCurrencyDialog.title: Add New Currency
AddCurrencyDialog.description: Define a new currency for the application.
AddCurrencyDialog.decimalPlacesMaxError: Decimal places cannot be more than 4.

SuppliersManager.title: Supplier Management
SuppliersManager.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the supplier "{supplierName}".
SuppliersManager.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, contact, or email...
SuppliersManager.updateCostsDescription: Upload a CSV or Excel file to bulk-update the cost price for this supplier's products.
SuppliersManager.updateCostsMappingError: Please select the identifier and cost columns from your file.
SuppliersManager.updateCostsApiError: An error occurred on the server during the cost update process.

AddSupplierDialog.title: Add New Supplier
AddSupplierDialog.description: Fill in the details to add a new supplier.
AddSupplierDialog.notesPlaceholder: e.g., Orders on Mondays. Contact for bulk discounts.

EditSupplierDialog.title: Edit Supplier
EditSupplierDialog.description: Update the details for "{supplierName}". Click save when you're done.

SupplierListTable.noSuppliersMessage: No suppliers found. Click 'Add New Supplier' to get started.

LoginPage.title: Login to Your Account
LoginPage.description: Enter your credentials to access the application.
LoginPage.loginErrorDescription: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

ForgotPasswordDialog.title: Forgot Your Password?
ForgotPasswordDialog.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordDialog.requestSuccessDescription: If an account exists with that email, a password reset link has been sent.
ForgotPasswordDialog.requestFailedError: An error occurred. Please try again later.

AccountSetupPage.title: Set Up Your Account
AccountSetupPage.description: Complete your account setup by choosing a password.
AccountSetupPage.passwordMinLengthError: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
AccountSetupPage.setupFailedError: Account setup failed. The link may be invalid or expired.
AccountSetupPage.setupSuccessDescription: You can now log in with your new password.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Reset Your Password
ResetPasswordPage.description: Create a new password for your account.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordMinLengthError: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
ResetPasswordPage.resetFailedError: Password reset failed. The link may be invalid or expired.
ResetPasswordPage.resetSuccessDescription: You can now log in with your new password.

SessionExpiration.title: Session Expiring Soon
SessionExpiration.description: Your session will expire in {countdown} seconds due to inactivity.

SmtpSettingsForm.title: Mail (SMTP) Settings
SmtpSettingsForm.description: Configure your external SMTP server for sending emails, like user invitations.
SmtpSettingsForm.descriptionDb: Configure your external SMTP server for sending emails. Changes are saved to the database.
SmtpSettingsForm.instruction1: Create or open the `.env.local` file in your project's root directory.
SmtpSettingsForm.instruction2: Add the following lines to the file, replacing the placeholder values with your actual SMTP server details:
SmtpSettingsForm.instruction3: Restart your application server for the changes to take effect.
SmtpSettingsForm.saveSuccessDescription: Your SMTP settings have been saved.
SmtpSettingsForm.errorFetchingSettings: Error fetching SMTP settings from database.

AiSettingsForm.title: AI Feature Settings
AiSettingsForm.description: Configure the Genkit AI integration to enable features like AI-assisted reports.
AiSettingsForm.instruction1: Create or open the `.env` file in your project's root directory.
AiSettingsForm.instruction2: Add the following line, replacing the placeholder with your actual Gemini API Key:
AiSettingsForm.instruction3: Restart your application server for the changes to take effect.

POSBehaviorSettingsForm.title: POS Behaviors
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.description: Customize how the Point of Sale screen operates.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.requireAuthForCartItemRemovalDescription: If enabled, a user with sufficient permissions must enter an authorization code to remove an item from the cart.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.dispatchAtSaleDefaultDescription: If enabled, the checkbox to dispatch inventory immediately upon sale completion will be checked by default.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.saveSuccessDescription: Your POS behavior settings have been saved.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.separateCartAndPaymentDescription: If enabled, the cart item list and the payment/summary panel will be in separate tabs instead of a single view.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.sessionDurationDescription: Session length for users who did not check 'Remember Me'.

ReceiptSettingsForm.title: Receipt Settings
ReceiptSettingsForm.description: Customize the appearance and content of your printed and digital receipts.
ReceiptSettingsForm.footerTextPlaceholder: e.g. Thank you for your purchase!\nFollow us @posapp
ReceiptSettingsForm.receiptPreviewDescription: This is a live preview of how your receipt will look.
ReceiptSettingsForm.saveSuccessDescription: Your receipt settings have been saved.

TableActions.groupingComingSoon: Grouping by {columnName} will be available soon.

DeleteConfirmation.title: Confirm Deletion
DeleteConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this {itemType}: "{itemName}"? This action cannot be undone.
